parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The supported language. Valid values:

- zh-CN: Chinese

- en-US: English

Default value: en-US.

> This parameter has a higher priority than Lang.

parameters.name: AuthorizedUserId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account to which the authorized resources belong.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

- **zh**: Chinese.

- **en**: English.

Default value: **en**.

> This parameter has a lower priority than AcceptLanguage.

parameters.name: Scene
parameters.description:
The scenario. Valid values:

- AUTH: built-in authoritative server

- FWD: forwarding management

- RA: traffic analysis

parameters.name: UserClientIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the user.

parameters.name: VpcType
parameters.description:
The type of the VPC. Valid values:

- STANDARD: standard VPC.

- EDS: Elastic Desktop Service (EDS) VPC.
